comments:
I20050419-1200 + JDT/Core capture patch

Attempting to perform inference of type arguments on big testcase (1.5 src libs)
it ended up with an error dialog and this exception in the log.

Markus, Philippe also claimed that for a big example this used 200MB of heap. So
as planned we should definitelly look at the heap consumption of this refactoring.

This particular NPE has been fixed for RC1. Error handling has been improved
such that new error messages should tell now in which file the error has happened.

Verfied on RC1 that NPE is fixed. However I now get an assertion failure while 
creating the changes. Openen separate bug report for it.
